phid_we_are_working_on_it:
We are working on growing this open network to include all the builders in the world.

Realtors, Designers, Architects, Contractors, Craftsmen, Suppliers, Distributors & Manufacturers of all building products.

To finally have a universal library of Builders.

Please share this to the builders in your network.

Let's build together
And grow together.

phid_bldrs_is:
This is the network of Bldrs.
For all those who contribute in constructing our planet
phid_who_are_developers: Those who seize lands, divide, plan & prepare it for the people to use
phid_who_are_brokers: Those who consult you, which, how & when to buy, sell, lease or rent properties
phid_who_are_designers: Those who Architect, Plan, Engineer & Decorate properties & their surrounding environment
phid_who_are_contractors: Those who manage, plan, operate, monitor, deliver & handover construction activities
phid_who_are_artisans:
The work force, The magic hands, who build the world by hand, brick after brick
The craftsmen, technicians, artists, industrialists & farmers
phid_who_are_manufacturers: Behind the scenes, those factories and workshops work on manufacturing tools, equipment, materials, raw materials, and construction products to be used in building the world.
phid_who_are_suppliers: The distributors, retailers, outlets, or stores who supply construction products, materials, tools, equipment, furniture, or anything else and also ship or deliver the goods
phid_who_are_owners:
You, The project owner, If you are building. furnishing or decorating a house, an office, a garden,a building, or an entire skyscraper.
you need The Seven Bldrs to get it done.
phid_what_do_bldrs_do: What do the Builders do in Bldrs.net ?

you may only delete the flyers and re-create them again to create an updated poster for each one of them
